product_name: SmartWool PhD Running Ultra-Light 3/4 Crew Socks
long_description: Comfy on trail or road, the SmartWool PhD Running Ultra Light 3/4 Crew socks feature thin fabric for a lightweight, barely-there feel that still offers the comfort of merino wool. SmartWool PhD Running Ultra Light 3/4 Crew socks offer a non-cushioned, precise fit; 6 in. overall height is perfect for keeping trail debris out. 4 Degree Elite Fit System improves comfort; 2 elastics provide greater stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place. Ankle bands, upper instep bands, lower instep bands and arch bands connect to the feet for a great fit and feel. Patented ReliaWool is a reinforcement construction that puts more wool in high-wear, high-impact areas to increase durability and comfort. Merino wool provides excellent temperature control and moisture management, so you're warm when it's cold and cool when it's warm. Merino wool keeps your feet dry and inhospitable to bacteria that can cause odor. Strategically placed mesh zones provide ventilation for temperature and moisture management. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine-washed and dried without shrinking. Virtually seamless toes offer durability and a low profile. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
